headline: HII is Awarded $6.7 Billion Contract to Support the U.S. Air Force’s Electronic Warfare Mission
summary: MCLEAN, Va., Dec. 05, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- HII (NYSE: HII) was awarded a $6.7 billion contract to provide electronic warfare engineering and technical services support for the U.S. Air Force. The indefinite delivery/indefinite quantity contract is the largest ever awarded to HII’s Mission Technologies division. “We have a team of subject matter experts with deep expertise in all aspects of electromagnetic spectrum and electronic warfare, and we are committed to staying a step ahead of our ad
